breathing.title: think of a name
breathing.subtitle: a being you want to honor, cherish, celebrate.

nameInput.title: now, type that name
nameInput.subtitle: it will rise to the Orbital Temple in space.

emailInput.title: type your email
emailInput.subtitle: so you get a message when the name ascends.

success.title:
The name {{name}}
is now queued for ascension.
When the temple aligns, you'll
receive a message.
